name: mile-quest-infrastructure
description: AWS CDK infrastructure for Mile Quest

scripts.deploy:all: npm run build && npx cdk deploy --all --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:cognito: npm run build && npx cdk deploy MileQuest-staging-Cognito
scripts.deploy:database: npm run build && npx cdk deploy MileQuest-staging-Database
scripts.deploy:external-services: npm run build && npx cdk deploy MileQuest-staging-ExternalServices
scripts.deploy:api: npm run build && npx cdk deploy MileQuest-staging-Api
scripts.deploy:cloudfront: npm run build && npx cdk deploy MileQuest-staging-CloudFront
scripts.deploy:monitoring: npm run build && npx cdk deploy MileQuest-staging-Monitoring
